name: places/ChIJOw8tAKNYwokR-gDD6wEJ6bI
formattedAddress: 51 E 90th St, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 51 E 90th St, New York, NY 10128-1205, USA

originalText.text:
Dr. Lipsey has been my doctor for over 20 years now. It would be difficult for me to thoroughly express how much I sincerely appreciate everything that he has done for me and my family.  He is very dedicated to his patients and runs his practice in a very professional manner with the utmost respect and integrity. Anyone treated by Dr. Lipsey will clearly see how much he truly cares about his patients. He takes the time to thoroughly communicate and explain everything related to exam results, treatment options, etc. He has always referred me to the best specialists to maintain the same level of top tier healthcare that is sadly not always the focus of all medical professionals. His strict office policies during the COVID pandemic gave me the confidence and peace of mind that visiting his office would be safe. He takes the safety of ALL his patients very seriously which is something that I and all patients should appreciate.

After one of my surgeries, he stopped by to check in on me during his rounds at the hospital. He also often follows up after any treatment or medication to see how I am doing. There is no amount of money or healthcare insurance that can guarantee the level of quality and genuine care that he puts into his practice. I am often hesitant to give referrals, but I have complete and absolute confidence in Dr. Lipsey and the care that he provides. He has been consistent for over 20 years. If I could give more than a 5-star rating I certainly would. Dr. Lipsey, if you ever read this, I thank you from the bottom of my heart for everything.!

originalText.text: I have known Dr. Lipsey for about twenty years now. He was my husband's oncologist during a difficult period in his life. He was there every step of the way during Alex's journey to healing. He is extremely professional and ensures that all his patients receive the medical care they need. He explores all avenues of appropriate treatment for all of his patients. I am forever grateful for the care he has provided my husband.

originalText.text: Dr. Lipsey has been treating me for several years for a number of medical issues.  He is extremely professional, very thorough, hard working  and communicates well with his patients.  I feel very well cared for in his medical practice. Importantly, his referrals to specialists are only to the best practitioners who treat patients to the same standard. I give my highest rating.

originalText.text: First time I met Dr. Lipsey was in 2021, I was being a advocate for myself During a high risk pregnancy. The second time, I try to see him, he told me to leave my 8 years outside when his secretary told me child was allowed in the office. I asked him, would he leave his child outside. Then I never return back again. Unfortunately, My surgeon needed his clearance just on the hematologist (regarding if I would need anticoagulant before or after). Let’s guess what happen, after several calls Dr. lipsey contacted me, His statement “unfortunately due to my office polices I won’t be able to see you if you don’t have your booster shot. Yes, I am aware you need my advice or clearance let me call you back. He never did. Throughout, my career theirs People who love their job and ppl who see things differently. I appreciate the work of my surgeon and she was able to provide me with another hematology. Who was willing to see the urgency in my care. Let’s say I am not to important enough for Dr. Lipsey. I will never ever recommend but he doesn’t need my recommendation. I always wondered if I was his race, his family would things have been different.

originalText.text: Thank you my dear Dr. Lipsey for your wonderful care. You check my tests, contact me the next day to discuss the results. You have sent me to good doctors and always contact them to keep informed about what changes are going on with me. You and your office staff are so kind. You helped in taking care of my sister, rest her soul as well. That was such a difficult time but you helped us both get through it. It was so good of the Lord to cross our paths so many years ago.
